line.comment: *$t = create text for custom menu, left='Required Energy', right=$maxEnergy.f
*add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$t returnvalue=null
*$t = create text for custom menu, left='Energy Consumption', right=$energyPerSec.f
*add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$t returnvalue=null
* Infoline is needed to be able to show the whole text.

sval.val: $t = create text for custom menu, left='Required Energy', right=$maxEnergy.f
add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$t returnvalue=null
$t = create text for custom menu, left='Energy Consumption', right=$energyPerSec.f
add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$t returnvalue=null
Infoline is needed to be able to show the whole text.
